docs.snippet: As Donald Trump’s official nomination approaches in Cleveland, a lifelong Republican comes to terms with a strange new party....
docs.lead_paragraph: As Donald Trump’s official nomination approaches in Cleveland, a lifelong Republican comes to terms with a strange new party.

docs.snippet: With convention plans calling for spectacle, truth will not come to the fore without hard work by the media and, potentially, a fight....
docs.lead_paragraph: With convention plans calling for spectacle, truth will not come to the fore without hard work by the media and, potentially, a fight.
docs.abstract: Jim Rutenberg Mediator column suggests Republican National Convention could prove to be test of American news media; notes media will face choice of treating event as spectacle for ratings, or as opportunity to provide context and perspective; observes convention will also be test of presumptive nominee Donald Trump.

headline.main: TV News: Truth Squad or Trump Infomercial?
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Convention Will Push the Limits of a Candidate and the News Media

docs.snippet: The Republican candidate has a golden opportunity at the convention to improve his standing with the voters, but don’t count on it....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Republican candidate has a golden opportunity at the convention to improve his standing with the voters, but don’t count on it.
docs.abstract: Charles M Blow Op-Ed column questions whether Donald Trump will take advantage of opportunity Republican National Convention offers to change his public image and become more universally appealing as candidate; posits Trump is more likely to turn moment usually framed as one of ascendance into one of collapse.

docs.snippet: News organizations shut out by Donald Trump will enjoy official entry to a Trump-led event for the first time in months, complicating his fight with the press....
docs.lead_paragraph: News organizations shut out by Donald Trump will enjoy official entry to a Trump-led event for the first time in months, complicating his fight with the press.
docs.abstract: Some news organizations which Donald J Trump has banned from his rallies and events will be at Republican National Convention; event will provide chance to see how GOP supports his battle with media.

headline.main: G.O.P. Arena Will Highlight Trump’s Media Blacklist
headline.print_headline: Convention Will Test the Limits of Trump’s Fight With the Media

docs.snippet: The Republican National Convention briefly erupted in chaos on Monday when opponents of presumptive U.S. presidential nominee Donald Trump stormed out of the room and others chanted in a failed attempt to force a vote opposing his candidacy....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Republican National Convention briefly erupted in chaos on Monday when opponents of presumptive U.S. presidential nominee Donald Trump stormed out of the room and others chanted in a failed attempt to force a vote opposing his candidacy.

headline.main: Trump Foes Shake Up Republican Convention
headline.print_headline: Trump Foes Shake Up Republican Convention

docs.snippet: Many in the news media feel the need to set up a false equivalence between a candidate who lies repeatedly and his opponent....
docs.lead_paragraph: Many in the news media feel the need to set up a false equivalence between a candidate who lies repeatedly and his opponent.
docs.abstract: Paul Krugman Op-Ed column blames tendency of news media to present all presidential candidates as equally good or bad, regardless of facts, for improbable success of Donald Trump in 2016 race; underscores how irresponsible it is to treat Trump as if he is not uniquely dangerous.

docs.snippet: Late-night TV satirists are setting up shop in Cleveland and Philadelphia at the G.O.P. and Democratic conventions....
docs.lead_paragraph: Late-night TV satirists are setting up shop in Cleveland and Philadelphia at the G.O.P. and Democratic conventions.
docs.abstract: Five late-night comedy talk shows from competing networks plan to air special live episodes from Republican and Democratic National Conventions; each hopes to distinguish itself from similar shows in crowded television genre.

headline.main: Live, From Cleveland! Late-Night Comics Stake Their Turf at Conventions
headline.print_headline: Clinton or Trump? How About Maher or Colbert?

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: The Daily Show with Trevor Noah (TV Program)

keywords.name: creative_works

docs.snippet: The mother of a State Department employee killed in the deadly attacks in Benghazi, Libya, angrily lashed out at Hillary Clinton on Monday at the Republican National Convention, accusing Clinton of lying to her about her son's death....
docs.lead_paragraph: The mother of a State Department employee killed in the deadly attacks in Benghazi, Libya, angrily lashed out at Hillary Clinton on Monday at the Republican National Convention, accusing Clinton of lying to her about her son's death.

headline.main: GOP Speakers Fault Clinton on Benghazi Deaths
headline.print_headline: GOP Speakers Fault Clinton on Benghazi Deaths

docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton on Monday called for an end to the "madness" after the death of three law enforcement officers in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, condemning a series of recent shootings involving police and vowing to hold those who kill police officers le...
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton on Monday called for an end to the "madness" after the death of three law enforcement officers in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, condemning a series of recent shootings involving police and vowing to hold those who kill police officers legally accountable.

headline.main: Clinton Condemns Shooting of Baton Rouge Officers
headline.print_headline: Clinton Condemns Shooting of Baton Rouge Officers

docs.snippet: After three police officers were fatally shot in Louisiana, Donald J. Trump is likely to amplify his “law-and-order” campaign theme....
docs.lead_paragraph: After three police officers were fatally shot in Louisiana, Donald J. Trump is likely to amplify his “law-and-order” campaign theme.
docs.abstract: Donald Trump, on eve of Republican National Convention in Cleveland, blasts Pres Obama's response to killing of three police officers in Baton Rouge, La, and asserts country is in grave danger; is likely to amplify his 'law and order' theme  after latest in recent series of racially-tinged shootings; killings set tense atmosphere in Cleveland as city prepares for opening of convention.

headline.main: On Eve of G.O.P. Convention, Law and Order Takes the Floor
headline.print_headline: On Eve of G.O.P. Convention, Law and Order Takes the Floor
